title: "We've temporarily disabled Fiora due to an in-game bug, and are working on fixing the problem."
body:
Take your time. Really.

Make sure she's all polished up. Fix every bug she has. Do all the testing you need to do. But take it easy, don't overwork yourselves, you know?

You have all the time in the world.

replies.body: Good riddance.
Malicious, you wound me.

As a Top laner I find myself get wounded by the baguette artist way too often for my liking.

So excuse my lack of positive feelings towards the b... Lovely Lady.

I understand your grievance, and the many complaints leveled against her are not without merit. She needs changes, no doubt.

I just want to play Fiora without being accused of abusing her balance state; I played Fiora well before her rework and I will be damned if balance changes stop me!

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PKj5AIag,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2016-02-25T15:52:25.166+0000)

> So excuse my lack of positive feelings towards the b... 


ಠ_ರೃ
>Lovely Lady.

=) 

Thank you. I knew you could be counted on for maintaining a civil disposition.

You have my respect for your dedication, through thick and thin.

Fair weather-players disgust me more than almost anything else in this game, I commend you.

Much obliged.

It's certainly a wild ride.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PKj5AIag,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-25T16:11:19.541+0000)

> 
> It's certainly a wild ride.

:^)
Hue.
//*insert insane high-pitch cackle*//
http://www.myinstants.com/media/sounds/00002a5b.mp3
_Insert {{champion:17}} laugh in repeat mode_
You two keep this up and they really WILL be writing yaoi fanfiction about you two... or use Veigar and Mordekaiser as proxy.... that would be weird....
Specter, please, refrain from mentioning such things.
But Superb sempai! I only do it so you notice  my evilness!
I will concede, it is quite evil.

But is it

Malicious?
Indubitably.
This whole thread? Things like this are why I haunt the boards.

O_o

I don't even want to know the details...

I will never understand why some people build her as beefy as they do... It's rather... disturbing because if you build her with actual AD and just two defensive items, namely {{item:3065}} and {{item:3742}} you're pretty well set. Though I personally would rather kill someone outright over prance around them only relying on my passive. I just have a fixation with causing bloodshed with her.

My experiences playing against her as a Shen main...

http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/Polter-Cow/Scar/YouHaveNoIdea.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PKj5AIag,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2016-02-25T15:52:25.166+0000)
>
> As a Top laner I find myself get wounded by the baguette artist way too often for my liking.
> 
> So excuse my lack of positive feelings towards the b... Lovely Lady.

Especially when you play Morde into her. It's like me in mid lane, oooh lets play Veigar!

{{champion:91}} 

..........................
Do you know the pain of playing Sion against her? Dodge, block cc, chunk you instantly, and no ability to escape as she dashes in front of your ult.
Sion is weirdly kinda skill-based. You have to mindgame her with your Q.
Harder than it sounds as she just blocks your cc and stuns you instead

Except, here's the thing. It's much like Jax's E against her. If she parries it before the first second is up, you just hit her with it when the parry ends. If she starts parry AFTER one second, you can hit her with a nigh-full-charge Q. And if she tries to wait it out until the last .75 seconds of your Q, you can just hit her with a one second-charged Q.

Of course, at that point, she'll just chunk your health away while you do little to no damage since you're Sion.

Edit: Grammar mistakes OP

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PKj5AIag,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-02-25T15:49:33.342+0000)
>
> Malicious, you wound me.

To be fair, he does that to everyone being a Morde Main.  Shredding just gets everywhere.
The "bug" is that she can build tank and still nuke you. Fix that.

That's more difficult mate. Maybe you should look at the items?
{{item:3748}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3742}}  for starters.
Why take away items that make other champs viable because one champ is abusing them?
{{champion:81}} *Maniacal laughter*

{{champion:122}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}}  Too lazy to finish. But I do count more than one user AND more than one abuser. I do have to laugh at everyone whining about Fiora. You see one, you pick Heimerdinger/Pantheon/Jax/Shen into her and you auto win. She wants to trade? K, lose your life and I'll take maybe 10% of my hp.
Panth counters her. Heimerdinger just counters melee top-laners in general. Jax and Shen I think are quite skill-based.
That's why pantheon has nerfs on pbe :D.
Wait I'm not home yet is she legit disabled?
http://imgur.com/OPVI7cn
A lot of Fiora lovers downvoting right here :v
Yep, counter-voting the scum.
Time to enjoy playing {{champion:27}} without having to ban Fiora every game. Now I just have to ban Graves every game.
Graves not worth a ban anymore, other champs do his job better then him.

He still fucks up Singed, though, quite a bit. Not as much as, say, Teemo or Quinn, but he's more common. And the general point of bans is to ban something that counters either your team or your champion, not just "Whatever's OP", right?
Took them 2 patches to realize that her %maxhp true damage is only a bug. (Not hoping for, Kappa)
The funny thing is that the 'bug' is that she was unable to be selected or banned in games, so she's been disabled to fix the bug where she's disabled
I can finally go a laning phase without having to go through the ultimate offense and ultimate defense that is Fiora.

Yes plz, I wouldn't mind if you spend a whole year fixing her.
Take your time.

This is the best news I've heard all week.

PRAISE THE SUN!

http://i.imgur.com/C9BuThzl.png
{{champion:131}}  PRAISE THE MOON!
